statements: UPDATE ChatMessages SET message_text = 'Hello, how are you?' WHERE message_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ChatMessages SET message_text = 'Hello World' WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ChatMessages SET receiver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001', timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE message_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE messages SET message_text = 'New message text' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'new_email@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE messages SET sender_id = 2, receiver_id = 3, message_text = 'Updated Message Text' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', registration_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE messages SET message_text='Hello, how are you?' WHERE message_id=1;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', join_date='2022-01-01' WHERE user_id=5;
UPDATE messages SET message_text = 'Hi there!' WHERE message_id = 1024;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'newusername' WHERE user_id = 567;
UPDATE messages SET timestamp = NOW() WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE channels SET description = 'New Description' WHERE channel_id = 3;
UPDATE messages SET message_text = 'Updated text' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE channels SET description = 'Updated description', created_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE channel_id = 3;
UPDATE chat_messages SET message_text = 'New message text' WHERE message_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE users SET email = 'new_email@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE chat_messages SET message_text = 'Updated message text', timestamp = '2022-01-01' WHERE message_id = 'abcd1234';
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'newusername' WHERE user_id = 'user123';
